name: OGA Jam Spring 2021 western shooter
description:
My entry for the OGA 'Spring' Game Jam 2021.

Originally designed for the GM38 Game Jam. Sadly i never got past the graphics stage and got nothing programmed in other then a title screen and a drafted mock up screen.

This Jam allowed me to go back to it and at least get something playable with the use of the things i had started already.

Only one stage in this small demo, but looking forward to doing lots more and making this a fully fledged title.

Feedback is welcome and thanks for checking this out. :)

Assets used in this game demo are as follows:

'Victory Sting' by congusbongus
